title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 4, pt. 634 - Supplementary Security Income And Assistance For The Aged, Blind And Disabled Reimbursement Claiming
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 4, pt. 634 - Supplementary Security Income And Assistance For The Aged, Blind And Disabled Reimbursement Claiming

State Regulations
§ 634.1 - Suspension of local district financial responsibility for additional State payments made to recipients of supplemental security income (SSI) benefits
§ 634.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for State supplementation of SSI or AABD
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 4, pt. 634

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§153, 207, 209, 210, 211, 212

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
